items: GOLD release of Windows desktop client and extensions 0.6.1.1 as a unified licensing system.
TEAM plan: up to 5 devices per subscription and many (50+) keys for users/devices.
Clear license states (trial/TEAM) with device and key counters.
Preparation for B2B/B2G: unified activation/renewal model for organizations.
New TEAM subscription screen (PRO/VIP/TEAM + FreeKassa) and explanatory texts in Settings.
'Apps' section in Settings, QR code for downloads page, updated footer and /downloads UI.
Tabs capture: brand icons (incl. DuckDuckGo), list 8+2.
Removed Open/Install and 'Special' section; updated descriptions.
